Posts.Content: pamaly wrote: Saw surgeon and went over preliminary report today. simply states "Both left axilla lymph nodes are negative for malignancy by standard H+E stains. Pending further immunohistochemical confirmation."  Goes on to say: "paraffin block will be forwarded to genzyme for immunohistochemical evaluation in order to rule out any subtle underlying malignancy and a final report will follow." Surgeon said no follow up appointment, no call to check final report. nothing she said this is final in her opinion. Any thoughts? Thanks, Pam Log in to post a reply
